header: Sustainable Development Solutions Network - Great Lakes
subtitle: Translating the latest expertise in sustainable development into action in Central and East Africa.
featureContent:
The Sustainable Development Solutions Network (SDSN) a global community of universities, research centers, and knowledge institutions. Our National network aims to teach sustainable development, support solution initiatives, and localize the SDGs in Antarctica.

We engage with scientists, engineers, business and civil society leaders, and development practitioners for evidence-based problem-solving.

benefitsTitle: Join our global network and work on practical solutions for sustainable development

involvedBenefits.header: Get access to academic expertise and work together with different sectors
Contribute to the sustainable development in your community
Get access to tools, resources, and opportunities to further your solutions
